name: CrusBlog
desc: A blog dedicated to CTF writeups, showcasing my journey in Capture The Flag competitions.

name: AI PDF Summarizer & Q&A Tool
desc: AI-powered web app to summarize PDFs and answer questions using fine-tuned BART/T5 and DeepSeek-R1 via Ollama.

name: Image Steganography Tool
desc: Command-line tool to encode and decode messages in images using LSB steganography and Pillow.

name: MD5 Malware Scanner
desc: Python/Tkinter GUI scanner that compares file hashes against known malware signatures.

name: ScanForge: TCP Port Scanner
desc: Scapy-based port scanner with multithreading, banner grabbing, and command-line target selection.

name: Password Manager with SHA256 & 2FA
desc: Secure password vault with encryption, SHA256, password generation, and two-factor authentication.

name: GachaSite
desc: Genshin Impact is an expansive open-world action RPG that requires strategic planning and resource management.
